resources.string: Click the foot icon on first kick to start counting
Click the timer icon to start timing
There are no pregnancy data available for now. Click the button below to start tracking pregnancy

To start tracking your pregnancy, we need to record your Last Menstrual Period (LMP) date. \n\nThe relevance of the tracker depends on the date you provide. If you do not remember your LMP date, make a close enough guess.
This will reset the tracker! \n\nDo you really want to change your Last Menstrual Period date?
This will reset the tracker! \n\nDo you really want to stop tracking pregnancy now?
This will reset the counter! All the data for this session will be lost. \n\nDo you really want to reset the counter now?
This will complete this session! All the data for this session will be saved. \n\nDo you really want to finish the session now?
This will completely delete all your baby kick data. This action can not be reversed! \n\nDo you really want to clear data now?
This will reset the timer! All the data for this session will be lost. \n\nDo you really want to reset the timer now?
This will complete this session! All the data for this session will be saved. \n\nDo you really want to finish the session now?
This will completely delete all your contraction data. This action can not be reversed! \n\nDo you really want to clear data now?
This will terminate the process. \n\ndo you really want to leave now?
The Last Menstrual Period date that you chose is invalid, please choose a valid date! \n\nYour LMP date should be less than 280 days since then.
An error occurred while attempting to save session data!
Your pregnancy is a day older! Have you read any health tips today?
After the long wait, it\'s finally time! Your little one is due today. Safe delivery!
The tracker automatically tracks your pregnancy data and provides relevant information about you and your baby. Click the white circle to proceed
A handy tool for counting your baby kicks!
Easily time contractions and discover how often they occur and other useful information
Keep you and your baby healthy with health tips exclusively for pregnant women!
You can always play this guide again by clicking here
Easily export your pregnancy reports in readable formats!
Use this menu to learn more about the app including Disclaimers and Privacy Policies (it is recommended you check these out first before using the app)
Displays the current status of the counter. Click inside the circle to proceed.
Tap this when the baby kicks. Initially, this will kick off the timer, keep tapping as soon as you feel your baby kick
Displays how many times the baby kicked
Displays the time the baby first kicked
Displays the time the baby last kicked
Resets the counter (clears all data for this session!)
Completes the session (saves all data for the session!)
Displays the current status of the timer. Click inside the circle to proceed.
Tap this when contraction starts. Initially, this will start timing the contraction. Tap again to rest when contraction stops. Continue this way until you no longer feel any contraction
Displays how many contractions you\'ve felt so far
Displays the time the first contraction was felt
Displays the time the last contraction was felt
Resets the timer (clears all data for this session!)
Completes the session (saves all data for the session!)
Click here to start tracking your pregnancy. Your\'re required to provide your Last Menstrual Period Date, this helps us provide relevant information and tips!
Displays your pregnancy weeks till date. This value is calculated from your Last Menstrual Period (LMP) date.\n\nThe next tab provides more pregnancy information!
This stops the tracker. This will effectively clear all pregnancy data including Baby Kicks and Contractions data!
Displays the Last Menstrual Period date you provided during initial setup
Use this to change your Last Menstrual Period Date. This restarts the tracker and will effectively clear all pregnancy data including Baby Kicks and Contractions data!
The best pregnancy application any woman could ask for :)

All the contents of this application, including medical opinion and any other health-related information, is for informational purposes only and should not be considered to be a specific diagnosis or treatment plan for any individual situation. Use of this application and the information contained herein does not create a doctor-patient relationship. Always seek the direct advice of your own doctor in connection with any questions or issues you may have regarding your own health or the health of others. \n\nSome of the images and contents are collected from open-source channels, the application developer do not claim any ownership of such resources!
